title: 美國眾議員希爾：國會該要支持香港人及通過香港人權民主法案

replies.msg:
I recently had the opportunity to hear directly from Hong Kong leaders dedicated to religious tolerance and democracy as promised in the “one country, two systems” agreement. Congress should support the people of Hong Kong and pass the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act.

https://t.co/Fbw70kQTvK
